title: Writing in Standard Form
text: We simply have to divide both sides by 8 to get $$\frac{x}{8}=y^2$$

title: Finding The Characteristics
text: We know from the equation that the vertex is (0,0), and that $$p=\frac{1}{32}$$. This means that that the directrix is $$x=\frac{-1}{32}$$ and the focus is $$(\frac{1}{32},0)$$
